content:
ActivityHandlerDescriptor Struct

Definition

Specifies the code-beside handler information in the stem.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.IWorkflowDebugger.BeforeHandlerInvoked* and stem.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.IWorkflowDebugger.UpdateHandlerMethodsForActivity* methods.

In this Article

[System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated.  Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
public struct ActivityHandlerDescriptor
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
ActivityHandlerDescriptor

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

Fields

Name

The DependencyProperty representing the name of the handler method.

public string Name;

Token

The DependencyProperty representing the CLR metadata token identifier for the handler method.

public int Token;
